reference.shortdesc: A Learning Plan topic describes learning needs and goals, instructional design models, task analyses, learning taxonomies, and other information necessary to the lesson planning process.

 The needs analysis Organizational needs Provide general description information. Provide information about organization goals related to this instruction. Describe organizational needs related to this instruction. Describe organizational values related to this instruction. Describe organizational constraints related to this instruction. The audience Provide general description information. Describe the education level for the learning audience. Provide age information. Provide background information. Describe the skills needed. The work environment Describe the work environment. Provide information about resource planning. Provide information about important processes. A task Describe the specific task item. Detail the knowledge needed for this task. Describe the skills needed. Provide information about important attitudes. Another task (as many more as you would like...) Describe the specific task item.
